profile

I’m a dedicated front-end developer with more than eighteen years experience in the world of digital media.
Because of my education and work as a graphic designer, interaction designer and programmer I am able look at a project from more than one perspective. I have a very broad range of highly developed skills which I nurture and expand.
For solo projects I used to share a workspace with other freelancers but the last few years I have mainly been working on location on larger team-based projects.
